description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔系统的最高等级。
description.en: The highest rank in the police ranking system of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔
en: Police Ranks of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察的警衔系统。
description.en: The rank system for the People's Police of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的公务员级别，总警监警衔授予对象。
description.en: A civil service rank in China, to whom the Commissioner General rank is awarded.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national public security work.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责国家安全工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for state security work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治和法律委员会

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任公安部部长，是首位被授予总警监警衔的人员之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security, and one of the first to be awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央政法委秘书长、公安部常务副部长，是首位被授予总警监警衔的人员之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary-General of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission and Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and one of the first to be awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家安全部部长，是首位被授予总警监警衔的人员之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of State Security, and one of the first to be awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家安全部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of State Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国前高级领导人，曾任中央政治局委员、公安部部长，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Former senior leader of China, served as a member of the Politburo and Minister of Public Security, later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 对前中共中央政治局常委周永康的腐败调查案件。
description.en: The corruption investigation case against former Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任公安部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家安全部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of State Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任公安部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家安全部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of State Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任公安部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任公安部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Minister of Public Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国家安全部部长，被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Minister of State Security, who was awarded the rank of Commissioner General.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔

description.zh-cn: 总警监是中华人民共和国人民警察警衔系统的最高等级。
description.en: Commissioner General is the highest rank in the Police Ranks system of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 1992年9月被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 在1992年9月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 1992年9月被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治和法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 在1992年9月授予总警监警衔时，担任中央政法委秘书长。
description.en: Served as the Secretary-General of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 在1992年9月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部常务副部长（正部长级）。
description.en: Served as the Executive Vice Minister of Public Security (ministerial level) at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 1992年9月被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 在1992年9月授予总警监警衔时，担任国家安全部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of State Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in September 1992.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in March 1998.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 在1998年3月授予总警监警衔时，担任国家安全部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of State Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in March 1998.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 2002年12月被授予总警监警衔，后因违纪违法被处理。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2002, and was later disciplined for violations of discipline and law.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 在2002年12月授予总警监警衔时，担任中央政治局委员。
description.en: Served as a Member of the Politburo at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2002.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治和法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 在2002年12月授予总警监警衔时，担任中央政法委副书记。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2002.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 在2002年12月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in December 2002.

relationships.target: 周永康

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月，周永康因严重违纪违法被开除党籍，其政治生涯终结。
description.en: In December 2014, Zhou Yongkang was expelled from the party for serious violations of discipline and law, ending his political career.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 2007年10月被授予总警监警衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in October 2007.

description.zh-cn: 在2007年10月授予总警监警衔时，担任公安部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Public Security at the time of being awarded the rank of Commissioner General in October 2007.

relationships.target: 总警监

description.zh-cn: 2008年晋升为总警监警衔。
description.en: Was promoted to the rank of Commissioner General in 2008.

description.en: Was awarded the rank of Commissioner General in November 2016.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年11月授予总警监警衔时，担任国家安全部部长。
